name: pnp-list-formatting-color-picker
title: Color Picker
shortDescription: This sample contains pre-defined palettes of color (default matches Power Apps). These palettes are then made available as a color picker setting the value on selection.
longDescription: This sample contains pre-defined palettes of color (default matches Power Apps). These palettes are then made available as a color picker setting the value on selection.

metadata.value: Icons, Inline Editing, Power Apps, Hover Cards

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
